Alturascope UK

About Alturascope UK

Alturascope UK is a specialised site-reality partner for landlords, funds, and occupiers across the United Kingdom. We turn messy, real-world spaces into clear, decision-ready visuals and reports you can trust for design, budgeting, and approvals.

Over time, we found that off-the-shelf tools couldn't support the level of clarity, repeatability, and technical depth required on complex sites. To solve that, we built an internal capture and reporting system — ScopeWalk™ — to support our field teams and ensure consistency across every visit.

Nationwide U.K. coverage
U.K.-wide mobilisation
Digital twin + detailed report on every visit

What we do

As-Built Site Reality

One visit to capture how a space truly is today so design and budgets start from reality, not assumptions.

  • Digital twin and photo storyboard
  • Fixture & services counts
  • Detailed conditions report with upsides & concerns

Construction Progress

Independent eyes on your build so pay apps, change orders, and hand-over decisions are grounded in evidence.

  • Fixed-route progress photos & notes
  • Issues & exceptions log
  • Reality-check against programme and draws

Portfolio & Lease Diligence

Comparable reality checks across multiple buildings so you can shortlist, renew, or relocate with confidence.

  • Like-for-like site summaries
  • Access, loading, and context call-outs
  • Red flags and hidden-cost indicators

How we work

Simple, repeatable steps on every engagement.

  1. 01. Scope

    Clarify the decision

    We align on what you’re deciding (renew, relocate, fund, phase, etc.) and what your team needs to see in order to move.

  2. 02. Mobilise

    Lock dates & access

    We book travel, coordinate with building management, and confirm any out-of-hours requirements.

  3. 03. Capture

    Walk, measure, record

    On site we follow a disciplined route, capturing structure, services, access and anything likely to affect design, cost, or schedule.

  4. 04. Deliver

    Turn into decisions

    You receive a digital twin, labelled photos, and a detailed report with fixture counts, a high-level mechanical overview, and prioritised recommendations.

Coverage & turnarounds

  • Nationwide coverage across the United Kingdom
  • U.K.-wide travel included for predictable mobilisation
  • Standard delivery window typically within a few business days of site access
  • Rush, evening, and weekend options where timelines are tight

What you receive every time

  • Digital twin or 360° walkthrough of the space
  • Photo storyboard labelled by area and topic
  • Counts for key fixtures and services
  • Notes on access, loading, vertical transport, and neighbours
  • Detailed written report with fixture counts and a high-level mechanical / services overview
  • Upside opportunities and concerns clearly highlighted
  • Recommendations prioritised (P1 / P2 / P3) so teams know what to act on first

Who we serve

Alturascope UK is built for teams who make decisions on space at scale:

Landlords & asset managers Office & workplace teams Retail & clinic roll-outs Private equity & lenders Design-build & GC partners

Typical markets include London, Birmingham, Manchester, Bristol, Leeds, and beyond.

Our standards

  • No “clipboard tourism” – every visit is scoped against a clear decision.
  • Consistent capture routes so multi-site data lines up like-for-like.
  • Clear separation of fact, risk, and opinion in every report.
  • Calm, professional conduct on site – we represent your brand.

Leadership

Alturascope UK is operated by a U.K.-based partner with deep local knowledge of business parks, high streets, industrial estates, and mixed warehouse/office sites.

The goal is simple: translate on-the-ground reality into clear, decision-ready outputs for teams who don’t have the time to walk every site themselves.

Ready to move a site forward?

Share the address, your decision point, and your timeline. We’ll confirm the scope, recommend the right visit type, and send a simple, all-in quote.
